appDesc.message: Automatically like YouTube videos from your favorite content creators.

appStoreDesc.message: Hammers the like button whenever you watch a video from a subscribed channel! No effort required. No need to authenticate. If you've already disliked a video, this extension won't override your choice. Additionally, you can: - Be more selective with your likes: Only like videos after you've watched for 2 minutes! - Automatically like EVERY video. You insane person, you! Suggest new features or contribute:
appStoreDesc.description: Full description for the web store
